sentences.sentence: Had I known, I would not have gone.
Were it not for your help, I would have failed.
sentences.translation_uz: Yordamingiz bo'lmaganda edi, men muvaffaqiyatsizlikka uchragan bo'lardim.

sentences.sentence: Should you need assistance, please call.
sentences.translation_uz: Agar yordam kerak bo'lsa, iltimos qo'ng'iroq qiling.

sentences.sentence: So intense was the heat that the road melted.
sentences.translation_uz: Issiqlik shu qadar kuchli ediki, yo'l erib ketdi.

sentences.sentence: Such was his anger that he could not speak.
sentences.translation_uz: Uning g'azabi shu qadar ediki, gapira olmasdi.

sentences.sentence: Try as he might, he could not lift it.
sentences.translation_uz: Qancha harakat qilmasin, u buni ko'tara olmadi.

sentences.sentence: Whatever the outcome, we must remain united.
sentences.translation_uz: Natija qanday bo'lishidan qat'i nazar, biz birlashgan holda qolishimiz kerak.

sentences.sentence: Strange though it may seem, I believe him.
sentences.translation_uz: G'alati tuyulsa ham, men unga ishonaman.
